name: The Diamond Adventure
description:
The Time Diamond Adventure is a puzzle and platform video game, similar to Castlevania or Prince of Persia. Its main feature is the character's ability to travel through time, being able to initiate time loops to return to the previous initial position after 5 seconds. This ability was obtained by obtaining the time diamond, and now he must use it to escape from the tower where he stole it.

Our process:

GitHub: https://github.com/JuanDavidCortesOssa/GameJam1.git
